description: Colophon at foot of p. 24 reads : Glasgow, printed by J. and M. Robertson, (No. 20) Saltmarket, 1808.| First published in 1762 as 'A copy of several conferences and meetings that past betwixt the Rev. Mr. Ogilvie and the ghost of Mr. Maxwell, late laird of Cool' (NUC).| Woodcut on title page.
